titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: TNM CATEGORY (FINAL PRETREATMENT) (Retired) - Description

p.b: This item has been retired from the NHS Data Model and Dictionary as it has been replaced by TNM STAGE GROUPING (FINAL PRETREATMENT).
The last live version of this item is available in the February 2014 release of the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.

div.p: Access to this version can be obtained by emailing information.standards@nhs.net with "NHS Data Model and Dictionary - Archive Request" in the email subject line.
